statements: SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM nanotechnology_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, lead_researcher FROM nanotechnology_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, collaboration_partner FROM nanotechnology_projects;
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_projects WHERE lead_researcher = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM nanotechnology_projects WHERE lead_researcher = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, lead_researcher FROM nanotechnology_projects WHERE collaboration_partner = 'XYZ Corp' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT lead_researcher, COUNT(project_id) AS total_projects FROM nanotechnology_projects GROUP BY lead_researcher HAVING total_projects > 2 ORDER BY total_projects DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, lead_researcher FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT collaborator_name, institution_name, start_date FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'external';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description, lead_researcher FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT project_name, lead_researcher, COUNT(collaboration_id) AS num_collaborators FROM projects JOIN collaborations ON projects.project_id = collaborations.project_id GROUP BY project_name, lead_researcher;
SELECT project_name, institution_name, collaboration_type FROM projects JOIN collaborations ON projects.project_id = collaborations.project_id WHERE collaborations.start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT project_id, project_name, collaborator_name, institution_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects JOIN collaborations ON projects.project_id = collaborations.project_id WHERE project_name LIKE '%research%' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE lead_researcher='John Doe';
SELECT collaborator_name, expertise FROM collaborators WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, collaborator_name FROM projects JOIN project_collaborators ON projects.project_id = project_collaborators.project_id JOIN collaborators ON project_collaborators.collaborator_id = collaborators.collaborator_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, lead_researcher FROM projects WHERE lead_researcher = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, collaborator_name, location FROM projects p JOIN project_collaborators pc ON p.project_id = pc.project_id JOIN collaborators c ON pc.collaborator_id = c.collaborator_id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(collaborator_id) AS num_collaborators FROM projects p LEFT JOIN project_collaborators pc ON p.project_id = pc.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, SUM(CAST(EXTRACT(DAY FROM end_date) AS INT)) AS total_duration_days FROM projects GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_duration_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress_tracker_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM progress_tracker_projects;
SELECT lead_researcher_id, collaboration_partner_id FROM progress_tracker_projects;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_specialty FROM researchers;
SELECT project_name FROM progress_tracker_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_specialty = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT collaboration_name, project_id FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_partner_id = 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM progress_tracker_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, update_description, update_date FROM progress_tracker_projects JOIN project_updates ON progress_tracker_projects.project_id = project_updates.project_id WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE project_status='Active';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_department='Computer Science' AND researcher_position='Professor';
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type='Research' AND collaboration_status='Ongoing';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_department FROM researchers WHERE researcher_position = 'Lead Researcher';
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'External Collaboration' AND collaboration_status = 'Active';
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
